about_the_game:
While the Count remains in a critical condition, all the affairs of the Fernandez County fall on the shoulders of Countess Maria de Fernandez. With each passing day, it becomes increasingly difficult for the Countess to manage the affairs of the County, but even more challenging to hide the Count's severe condition from the people. Fearing the discontent of the inhabitants, Maria puts all her efforts into treating the Count and prepares for the worst...

The demo version presents the prologue of the game from the perspective of Countess Maria de Fernandez.

The events take place a few days before the start of the main game.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features mature themes and plot developments, alcohol consumption, scenes eroticism, violence, and includes nudity.
